ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
A Reference_packaged_part_interconnect_implementation is a type of .

A Default_trace_template is a type of . The Default_trace_template is associated with a particular , to allow verification that the design of the trace template meets the relevant minimum and maximum guidelines of that .
the of_stratum_technology specifies the role of the for the Default_trace_template.

The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
A Part_text_template is a type of that is the information required to support the creation of text messages in the stratum material on the or in a marking application.
The explicit shape of the Part_text_template is provided in the Part_template_3d_shape Part_template_non_planar_2d_shape, and Application objects.
The explicit shape of the bounding box for the Part_text_template is provided in the Part_template_3d_keepout_shape and the .
the stroke_width specifies the that is the distance across a single line that draws the glyph for the Part_text_template. The stroke_width is optional and need not be supplied.
the slant_angle specifies the that is the deviation from vertical for the Part_text_template. The slant_angle is optional and need not be supplied.
the maximum_font_negative_vertical_extent specifies the role of the for the extent of the Part_text_template in the negative Y direction.
the maximum_font_negative_horizontal_extent specifies the role of the for the extent of the Part_text_template in the negative X direction.
the maximum_font_positive_vertical_extent specifies the role of the for the extent of the Part_text_template in the positive Y direction.
the maximum_font_positive_horizontal_extent specifies the role of the for the extent of the Part_text_template in the positive X direction.
the font specifies either the or the for the Part_text_template. The font is optional and need not be supplied.

The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
A Snowball_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be added to a trace termination that is parameterized by the radius of the material addition geometry. The Snowball_template edge is required to be overlapping the Definition_based_layout_occurrence that is associated by virtue of the that references the occurrence of the Snowball_template. The parameters associated with a Snowball_template allow for one or more shapes to be instantiated with the same . The center of the circle or circles shall be on the centreline curve of the associated referenced indirectly by the .
The occurrence of a Snowball_template will be a that is referenced by a by the auxiliary_joint_material attribute.
The is associated because the directly referenced by references a .

A Special_symbol_part_template is a type of that defines a Special_symbol.
A corporate logo would be a Special_symbol_part_template.
the of_stratum_technology specifies the role of the for the . There may be one or more . The is optional and need not be provided.

A Teardrop_by_angle_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be added to a trace termination that is parameterized by the angle of the material addition geometry. The Teardrop_by_angle_template edge is required to be tangential to the Definition_based_layout_occurrence that is associated by virtue of the that references the occurrence of the Teardrop_by_angle_template. The vertex of the angle shall be on the centreline of the associated by the . The angle shall be less than 90 degrees.
The occurrence of a Teardrop_by_angle_template will be a that is referenced by a by the auxiliary_joint_material attribute.
the teardrop_angle specifies the role of the for the Teardrop_by_angle_template.

A Teardrop_by_length_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be added to a design feature. The teardrop_taper_start_distance and teardrop_taper_end_distance shall be measured from the location of the of the referenced by the that references a that is an occurrence of Teardrop_by_length_template. The centreline of the Stratum_feature_template_occurrence that is an occurrence of the Teardrop_by_length_template shall be congruent with the centreline of the it is associated with.
the teardrop_taper_end_distance specifies one role of the for the Teardrop_by_length_template.
the teardrop_taper_start_distance specifies one role of the for the Teardrop_by_length_template.

A Trace_template is a type of whose purpose is to define the width of a and the style of the ends and corners of that . A Trace_template may be a . A Trace_template shall not specify a curve_font on the specified by trace_style.
Figure illustrates the cross-section view related to a Trace_template. The parameters included in the illustration are included in the for the associated and will be assigned specific values through and associated application objects.

the trace_style specifies the role of the for the Trace_template.
The Trace_template uses the parametric information in , not the graphical presentation information.
